## Checklist before requesting a review

> Add 'x' into checkbox

-   [ ] Written Jest test(s)
-   [ ] Written Storybook story(s)
-   [ ] DESIGNER confirmed my PR is visually correct
-   [ ] I have reviewed my own code
-   [ ] I have checked locale translations
